text: Most medical physicists work in the physics of radiation oncology making sure that the desired dose is given to the cancer and the dose to normal tissues are minimized.
author: John Cameron

text: Medical physicists work in cooperation with doctors. A few medical physicists devote their time to research and teaching. A few get involved with administrative duties.
author: John Cameron

text: I am sure that I have been much more useful to society as a medical physicist.
author: John Cameron

text: When I entered medical physics in 1958 there were fewer than 100 in the U.S. and I could see many opportunities to apply my knowledge of nuclear physics.
author: John Cameron

text: I was the Chair of the first department of medical physics in a medical school in the U.S.
author: John Cameron
